body_html:
For those willing to look out of gcr.io, there is a Docker image in Docker Hub packing Python 3 Tensorflow (0.10.0rc0 at the time of writing) with IPython notebook installed, pretty much like the supported ones:
https://hub.docker.com/r/erroneousboat/tensorflow-python3-jupyter/
Edit: Also, it is Debian Jessie (8.5), not Ubuntu 14.04

Edit: Also, it is Debian Jessie (8.5), not Ubuntu 14.04
body:
For those willing to look out of gcr.io, there is a Docker image in Docker Hub packing Python 3 Tensorflow (0.10.0rc0 at the time of writing) with IPython notebook installed, pretty much like the supported ones:
https://hub.docker.com/r/erroneousboat/tensorflow-python3-jupyter/
_Edit:_ Also, it is Debian Jessie (8.5), not Ubuntu 14.04
